mapper.insert: INSERT INTO dbo.B_ChannelTask ( ID , ProjectID , Name , TaskType , TaskCode , StartTime , EndTime , TaskAreaID , TaskAreaName , WorkStartTime , WorkEndTime , WorkRange , CustomerTarget , Creator , CreateTime , IsDel , Status ) VALUES ( #{ChannelTaskID} , #{ProjectID} , #{Name} , #{ChannelTypeID} , #{TaskCode} , #{StartTime} , #{EndTime} , #{TaskAreaID} , #{TaskAreaName} , #{WorkStartTime} , #{WorkEndTime} , #{WorkRange} , #{CustomerTarget} , #{UserID} , GETDATE() , 0 , 1 )
INSERT INTO dbo.B_ChannelTask_TaskArea ( ChannelTaskID , TaskAreaID , IsDel , Status ) VALUES ( #{ChannelTaskID} , #{TaskAreaID} , 0 , 1 )
mapper.delete: UPDATE dbo.B_ChannelTask SET Status = 3 , Editor = #{UserID} , EditTime = GETDATE() WHERE ID = #{ChannelTaskID};
UPDATE B_ChannelTask_ChannelUser SET Status = 3 WHERE ChannelTaskID = #{ChannelTaskID};
mapper.select: INSERT INTO S_Message( ID, ProjectID, BizID, BizType, Subject, Content, Sender, SendTime, MessageType, Receiver, IsRead, IsPush, IsNeedPush,IsApprove, Creator, CreateTime, IsDel, Status) SELECT NEWID(),'',#{ChannelTaskID},'ChannelTask','任务提前结束通知','任务:['+b.Name +'] 已被渠道专员提前结束',b.Creator,GETDATE(),'7D7663A7-2867-43D1-89E8-73459A137A1B',a.ChannelUserID,0,0,1,0,'sys',GETDATE(),0,1 FROM dbo.B_ChannelTask_ChannelUser a INNER JOIN dbo.B_ChannelTask b ON a.ChannelTaskID=b.ID AND b.IsDel=0 WHERE a.ChannelTaskID=#{ChannelTaskID} AND a.IsDel=0;
SELECT * FROM dbo.B_ChannelTask WHERE ProjectID = #{ProjectID} AND Creator = #{UserID} AND Status = 2
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO B_CheckClockRecord ( ID , ChannelTaskID , CheckDate , Longitude , Dimension , Photo , DeviceCode , CheckType , TaskAreaID , TaskAreaName , Creator , CreateTime , Editor , EditTime , IsDel , Status ) VALUES ( #{ID} , #{ChannelTaskID} , CONVERT(VARCHAR(10),GETDATE(),111) , #{Longitude} , #{Dimension} , #{Photo} , #{DeviceCode} , #{CheckType} , #{TaskAreaID} , #{TaskAreaName} , #{UserID} , GETDATE() , #{UserID} , GETDATE() , 0 , 1 )
mapper.select: SELECT TOP 1 * FROM dbo.B_CheckClockRecord WHERE Creator = #{UserID} AND DateDiff(dd,CreateTime,getdate()) = 0 ORDER BY CreateTime
SELECT TOP 1 * FROM dbo.B_CheckClockRecord WHERE DeviceCode = #{DeviceCode} AND DateDiff(dd,CreateTime,getdate()) = 0 ORDER BY CreateTime
mapper.update: UPDATE dbo.B_Clue SET ChannelUserID = #{NewChannelUserID},ChannelCollaborator = #{UserID},Editor = #{UserID} , EditeTime = GETDATE() WHERE ChannelUserID = #{OldChannelUserID}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(1) a FROM dbo.B_ChannelTask_ChannelUser WHERE ChannelTaskID=#{ChannelTaskID} AND ChannelUserID=#{UserID}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO dbo.B_ChannelTask_ChannelUser ( ChannelTaskID , ChannelUserID , ChannelUserName , ChannelUserMobile , IsDel , Status ) VALUES ( #{ChannelTaskID} , -- ChannelTaskID - varchar(36) #{UserID} , -- ChannelUserID - varchar(36) dbo.F_GetReportUserName(#{UserID}) , -- ChannelUserName - varchar(50) dbo.F_GetReportUserMobile(#{UserID}) , -- ChannelUserMobile - varchar(50) 0 , -- IsDel - tinyint 1 -- Status - tinyint )
mapper.update: UPDATE B_ChannelTask_ChannelUser SET IsDel=0,Status = 1 WHERE ChannelTaskID=#{ChannelTaskID} AND ChannelUserID=#{UserID}
mapper.select: SELECT Status FROM dbo.B_ChannelTask WHERE ID=#{ChannelTaskID}
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO S_Message( ID, ProjectID, BizID, BizType, Subject, Content, Sender, SendTime, MessageType, Receiver, IsRead, IsPush, IsNeedPush,IsApprove, Creator, CreateTime, IsDel, Status)
SELECT NEWID(),'',a.ChannelTaskID,'ChannelTask','任务提前结束通知','任务:['+b.Name +'] 已被渠道专员提前结束',b.Creator,GETDATE(),'7D7663A7-2867-43D1-89E8-73459A137A1B',a.ChannelUserID,0,0,1,0,'sys',GETDATE(),0,1 FROM dbo.B_ChannelTask_ChannelUser a INNER JOIN dbo.B_ChannelTask b ON a.ChannelTaskID=b.ID AND b.Creator='{OldUserID}' AND b.Status=2 AND b.IsDel=0 WHERE a.IsDel=0;
mapper.update: UPDATE B_ChannelTask_ChannelUser SET Status = 3 WHERE ChannelTaskID IN (SELECT ID FROM dbo.B_ChannelTask WHERE Creator='{OldUserID}');
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO dbo.B_CustomerPotentialFollowUp ( ID ,CustomerPotentialID ,CustomerPotentialMobile ,CustomerPotentialName ,ClueID ,FollwUpUserID ,FollwUpUserName , FollwUpType ,FollwUpWay ,FollowUpContent ,Creator ,CreateTime ,IsDel ,Status ,FollwUpUserRole ,CustomerRank ,ProjectID)
SELECT NEWID(),a.CustomerPotentialID,a.Mobile,a.Name,a.ID,'{UserID}','{UserDisName}','C1E26493-7D4E-4BFC-9238-725180DFC7AE' ,'C1E26493-7D4E-4BFC-9238-725180DFC7AE','渠道经理重分配渠道专员','99',GETDATE(),0,1,'B0BF5636-94AD-4814-BB67-9C1873566F29' ,a.CustomerRank,a.IntentProjectID FROM dbo.B_Clue a LEFT JOIN dbo.B_Opportunity b ON a.ID=b.ClueID AND b.IsDel=0 WHERE a.ReportUserID='{OldUserID}' AND a.IntentProjectID='{ProjectID}' AND a.IsDel=0 AND (b.ID IS NULL or b.Status<4);
mapper.update: UPDATE a SET a.ReportUserID='{NewUserID}', a.ReportUserName = dbo.F_GetSaleUserName('{NewUserID}'),a.ChannelUserID = NULL, ChannelTaskID = NULL, a.Editor = '{UserID}' , a.EditeTime = GETDATE() , a.TheLatestFollowUpDate = GETDATE() FROM dbo.B_Clue a LEFT JOIN dbo.B_Opportunity b ON a.ID=b.ClueID AND b.IsDel=0 WHERE a.ReportUserID='{OldUserID}' AND a.IntentProjectID='{ProjectID}' AND a.IsDel=0 AND (b.ID IS NULL or b.Status<4);

UPDATE a SET a.ReportUserID='{NewUserID}' FROM dbo.B_ChannelUser a INNER JOIN dbo.B_ChannelTask_ChannelUser b ON a.ID=b.ChannelUserID AND b.IsDel=0 INNER JOIN dbo.B_ChannelTask c ON b.ChannelTaskID=c.ID AND c.IsDel=0 WHERE a.ReportUserID='{OldUserID}' AND c.ProjectID='{ProjectID}' AND a.IsDel=0 AND a.Status=1;
mapper.select: SELECT b.ID,b.Name,b.TelPhone Mobile,b.HeadImg,ISNULL(d.CustomerCount,0) CustomerCount,dbo.GetPYFirst(b.Name) FirstChar,a.IsDel FROM dbo.B_SalesGroupMember a INNER JOIN dbo.B_SalesUser b ON a.MemberID=b.ID AND b.IsDel = 0 AND b.Status=1 INNER JOIN B_SalesGroup c ON a.ReceptionGroupID=c.ID AND c.Nature IN(3,4,5,6,7) AND c.Status=1 AND c.IsDel=0 INNER JOIN dbo.S_Account ac ON ac.ID=a.MemberID AND ac.IsDel=0 AND ac.Status=1 LEFT JOIN ( SELECT ReportUserID,COUNT(1) CustomerCount FROM dbo.B_Clue WHERE IntentProjectID=#{ProjectID} AND IsDel=0 GROUP BY ReportUserID ) d ON a.MemberID=d.ReportUserID WHERE a.IsDel = 0 AND a.RoleID = '48FC928F-6EB5-4735-BF2B-29B1F591A582' AND a.ProjectID=#{ProjectID} ${sqlWhere}

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ct.ID , ct.Name , ct.ProjectID , ct.TaskType , dbo.F_DictName(ct.TaskType) TaskTypeName , ct.TaskCode , ct.StartTime , ct.EndTime , ct.TaskAreaID , ct.TaskAreaName , cta.Longitude , cta.Dimension , ct.WorkStartTime , ct.WorkEndTime , ct.WorkRange , ct.CustomerTarget , ( SELECT COUNT(1) FROM dbo.B_Clue b WHERE b.ChannelTaskID = ct.ID ) CustomerCount , ct.Status, ct.CreateTime, ct.Creator, su.Name UserName , su.TelPhone Mobile FROM dbo.B_ChannelTask ct INNER JOIN dbo.B_SalesUser su ON ct.Creator = su.ID LEFT JOIN dbo.B_ChannelTaskArea cta ON ct.TaskAreaID = cta.ID WHERE ct.IsDel = 0 AND ct.Status = 2 AND ct.ProjectID = #{ProjectID} ) n ORDER BY CreateTime DESC

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT a.ID , a.ProjectID , a.Name , a.TaskType , dbo.F_DictName(a.TaskType) TaskTypeName , a.TaskCode , a.StartTime , a.EndTime , a.TaskAreaID , a.TaskAreaName , c.Longitude , c.Dimension , a.WorkStartTime , a.WorkEndTime , a.WorkRange , a.CustomerTarget , a.Creator, ( SELECT COUNT(1) FROM dbo.B_Clue b WHERE b.ChannelTaskID = a.ID ${JZCode} ) CustomerCount , a.Status, ROW_NUMBER() OVER ( ORDER BY a.CreateTime DESC ) num FROM dbo.B_ChannelTask a LEFT JOIN dbo.B_ChannelTask_ChannelUser b ON a.ID = b.ChannelTaskID LEFT JOIN dbo.B_ChannelTaskArea c ON c.ID = a.TaskAreaID WHERE a.IsDel = 0 ${whereStr} GROUP BY a.ID ,a.ProjectID ,a.Name ,a.TaskType ,a.TaskCode , a.StartTime ,a.EndTime , a.TaskAreaID ,a.TaskAreaName , c.Longitude ,c.Dimension ,a.WorkStartTime ,a.WorkEndTime ,a.WorkRange ,a.CustomerTarget ,a.Creator,a.CreateTime,a.Status ) t WHERE t.num > ( #{PageIndex} - 1 ) * #{PageSize} AND t.num <= #{PageIndex} * #{PageSize};
SELECT COUNT(1) recordCount FROM ( SELECT a.ID FROM dbo.B_ChannelTask a LEFT JOIN dbo.B_ChannelTask_ChannelUser b ON a.ID = b.ChannelTaskID WHERE a.IsDel = 0 ${whereStr} GROUP BY a.ID ) a

SELECT * FROM (SELECT a.ID , a.ProjectID , a.Name , a.TaskType , dbo.F_DictName(a.TaskType) TaskTypeName , a.TaskCode , a.StartTime , a.EndTime , a.TaskAreaID , a.TaskAreaName , c.Longitude , c.Dimension , a.WorkStartTime , a.WorkEndTime , a.WorkRange , a.CustomerTarget , a.Creator, ( SELECT COUNT(1) FROM dbo.B_Clue b WHERE b.ChannelTaskID = a.ID ${JZCode} ) CustomerCount , a.Status, ROW_NUMBER() OVER ( ORDER BY a.CreateTime DESC ) num FROM dbo.B_ChannelTask a LEFT JOIN dbo.B_ChannelTask_ChannelUser b ON a.ID = b.ChannelTaskID LEFT JOIN dbo.B_ChannelTaskArea c ON c.ID = a.TaskAreaID WHERE a.IsDel = 0 ${WHERE} GROUP BY a.ID ,a.ProjectID ,a.Name ,a.TaskType ,a.TaskCode , a.StartTime ,a.EndTime , a.TaskAreaID ,a.TaskAreaName , c.Longitude ,c.Dimension ,a.WorkStartTime ,a.WorkEndTime ,a.WorkRange ,a.CustomerTarget ,a.Creator,a.CreateTime,a.Status ) t WHERE t.num > ( #{PageIndex} - 1 ) * {PageSize} AND t.num <= #{PageIndex} * #{PageSize};

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT a.ID , a.Name , a.Mobile , a.HeadImg , dbo.GetPYFirst(a.Name) FirstChar , ( SELECT COUNT(1) FROM dbo.B_Clue WHERE ChannelUserID = a.ID ) CustomerCount , a.IsDel , ROW_NUMBER() OVER ( ORDER BY dbo.GetPYFirst(a.Name) DESC ) num FROM dbo.B_ChannelUser a INNER JOIN dbo.B_ChannelTask_ChannelUser b ON a.ID = b.ChannelUserID INNER JOIN dbo.B_ChannelTask c ON b.ChannelTaskID = c.ID AND c.IsDel = 0 WHERE 1 = 1 AND a.Isdel = 0 ${sqlWhere} GROUP BY a.ID ,a.Name ,a.Mobile ,a.HeadImg ,a.IsDel ) t WHERE t.num > ( #{PageIndex} - 1 ) * #{PageSize} AND t.num <= #{PageIndex} * #{PageSize};

SELECT COUNT(1) recordCount FROM ( SELECT a.ID FROM dbo.B_ChannelUser a INNER JOIN dbo.B_ChannelTask_ChannelUser b ON a.ID = b.ChannelUserID INNER JOIN dbo.B_ChannelTask c ON b.ChannelTaskID = c.ID AND c.IsDel = 0 WHERE 1 = 1 AND a.Isdel = 0 ${sqlWhere} GROUP BY a.ID ,a.Name , a.Mobile ,a.HeadImg , a.IsDel ) a
